Desc.entry: As part of a sheltered housing scheme belonging to Northern Counties Housing Association, residents organise a small social club for the elderly in the local community and residents of the housing scheme.

ProvisionDaysAndTimes.entry: Mon at 7.30pm (bingo), Tues at 3pm (chairobics), Wed at 9.30am (coffee morning), 7.30pm (yoga)

category.entry: CLUBS FOR OLDER PEOPLE - POSTAL DISTRICT 2
